it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ma.group10.trump.controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for the communication between the model and the view, it asks to the model to perform actions and tells the view what to show

                     GameActivity gameActivity)

        Throws:
        PlayerException - in case the played card is not allowed

        Throws:
        DeckException - if the deck is badly managed
        DealerException - if the dealer does something not allowed
